class KeyFactory

Detailed Description

Provide interface for symmetrical encryption. 

 gaia::security::SecretKey seckey;
 const_DES_cblock input = "test string";
 seckey.encryptData(input);
 seckey.decryptData(skey.encrypted);

void gaia::security::SecretKey::setCipherMode ( CipherMode  CipherMode)

Set cipher parameters.

ECB does not hide patterns well, and is not recommended to be used in any security protocol. Use CBC for security- and ECB for non-security-related encryption.

Parameters:
AlgoTypeAlgorithm type.
CipherModeCipher mode, CBC(Cipher block chaining) or ECB(Electronic codebook).
